message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to acquire something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $15000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $10000. It's the maximum I can spend at this time.

I understand that $10000 is a bit lower than what I was initially hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $12500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value of the product.
